actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to preserve railroad rights-of-way for recreational and other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to acquire, other than by condemnation, title to railroad rights-of-way which are not being used to provide rail services. States that such lands are to be made available on a lease basis to public or private entities for public recreational purposes or other public purposes. Authorizes such appropriations as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to preserve railroad rights-of-way for recreational and other purposes.
